WHO AM I

I'm bunnyguy and I'm a tinkering artist!
My favorite number is 153 and my favorite color is yellow.

Download my resume?

Professional jargon

Modified about-me from the Hack Club team page:

Bunnyguy is a 17-year-old Viet-American artist and programmer based in the United States.
Bunnyguy has previously contributed art for Hack Club programs such as Counterspell, High Seas, and Summer of Making.

Back in the summer of 2025, I interned at Hack Club to help organize Undercity, a 4-day hardware hackathon hosted at GitHub HQ.

Cooler about-me

I don't have any pets, but I own and play with multiple beloved Tamagotchi.

I'm especially a big fan of the games Mirror's Edge and Portal 2. They have completely altered my brain chemistry.


Also see my listography for more stuff about me.

Bunnyguy NOW!

01/23/2026: 1130

  • Mood: sleepy and jittery
  • Tamagotchi: none (dead D:)
  • Current song: Ready to Fly - Masayoshi Takanaka
  • Current fixations: Alto's Adventure
  • Current studies: none (still busy)

A lot of art assets I had to do got rescheduled to a few months in the future... a great weight has been lifted off my back, but it is only delayed to a future date.

So now i will just work on getting as many finished pages on my website.

Also renewed the bunnyguy.foo domain, just so broken links all around don't live forever. If you're still using that domain, please switch over to sundial.city! I won't be renewing it this year!
